post.content:
We currently have a need for several Distributed Technical Leads for a long-term credit system engagement with one of our clients in Toronto.

Role:
Your responsibilities will be to perform high-level analysis and translate the analysis into detailed design specifications, assess impact on other applications, review code, consult and provide direction for the analyst/development team.  You will work closely with other project teams to ensure consistency in coding standards and approaches; ensuring that all projects can take advantage of re-use opportunities and best practices.

Skills:
•        Knowledge of credit systems is an asset.
•        Strong analytical, team building, problem solving skills.
•        Experience working on large-scale, multi-component, highly complex projects.
•        Extensive experience working with groups.
•        Ability to mentor, lead teams.
•        Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
•        Experience with Business Areas on solutions analysis/design.
•        Strong design skills (OOA, OOD); end-to-end application design.
•        Excellent analysis and development skills (at least 3 years) using Java, J2EE, Object Oriented, and related technologies.
•        Strong experience with JCL, DB2, IMS/DC, TSO, MVS.
•        Experience with use cases.
•        Good understanding of Rational Rose / UML.
•        Good understanding of performance tuning.
•        Able to create detailed design documents, technical specifications.
•        Experience with SDLC (System Development Life Cycle) or RUP (Rational Unified Process).
•        Financial Institution experience is an asset.

Please forward resume or call me
